record

private void record(ArgumentType arg,
                    PerformanceMetrics performanceMetrics)
Records the results of a benchmark run (identified by the arguments).

Parameters:
arg - identifies the benchmark
performanceMetrics - the results

run

protected abstract void run(ArgumentType val)
The method our clients have to implement. This method should run the benchmark for the configure given in val.

Parameters:
val - the config for the benchmark.

getResults

public PerformanceMetrics getResults(ArgumentType arg)
Get the results for the run with argument arg. Will return null if the benchmark was not run.

Parameters:
arg - the argument
Returns:
the metrics collected for the benchmark run

configure

public final java.lang.Runnable configure(ArgumentType val)
Returns a runnable that represents the benchmark. This is provided for future parallelization. TODO: fix the race for performance metrics.

Parameters:
val - the configuration to use
Returns:
a runnable that encapsulates the benchmark
